com.tibbo.aggregate.common.plugin

Interface AggreGatePlugin

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AuthenticationPlugin, ContextPlugin, DeviceDriver
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAuthenticationPlugin, AbstractContextPlugin, AbstractDeviceDriver, AuthenticationPluginDecorator, BasePlugin, DemoDeviceDriver, DemoServerPlugin, ExtensionsPlugin

    public interface AggreGatePlugin

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Context createGlobalConfigContext(Context rootContext, boolean requestReboot, VariableDefinition... properties)
      This method creates and returns context containing plugin's global configuration.
      Context createUserConfigContext(Context userContext, boolean requestReboot, VariableDefinition... properties)
      This method creates and returns context containing plugin's user-level configuration.
      java.lang.String getDescription()
      Returns plugin description
      Context getGlobalConfigContext()
      Returns plugin's global configuration context
      java.lang.String getId()
      Returns plugin ID
      java.lang.String getShortId()
      Returns plugin short ID (last "segment" of full ID).
      int getSortIndex()
      Returns sort index used to sort plugins in the list.
      Context getUserConfigContext(java.lang.String username)
      Returns plugin's user-level configuration context or NULL if user-level configuration is disabled for the user.
      void globalDeinit(Context rootContext)
      This method is called once during server shutdown.
      void globalInit(Context rootContext)
      This method is called once during server startup.
      void globalStart()
      This method is called once for every plugin at the moment when server context tree is fully initialized and all contexts are available.
      void globalStop()
      This method is called once for every plugin upon server shutdown.
      void userDeinit(Context userContext)
      This method is called once for every system user upon its deletion or server shutdown.
      void userInit(Context userContext)
      This method is called once for every system user upon its creation or server startup.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        java.lang.String getId()
        Returns plugin ID
        Returns:
        Plugin ID

      • getShortId

        java.lang.String getShortId()
        Returns plugin short ID (last "segment" of full ID).
        Returns:
        Plugin short ID

      • getDescription

        java.lang.String getDescription()
        Returns plugin description
        Returns:
        Plugin description

      • getSortIndex

        int getSortIndex()
        Returns sort index used to sort plugins in the list. Plugins with zero sort index are used according to their descriptions.
        Returns:
        Plugin sort index

      • globalInit

        void globalInit(Context rootContext)
         throws PluginException
        This method is called once during server startup. Its implementation will in most cases call createGlobalConfigContext() to create plugin global configuration. Another typical use is opening some listening server socket to accept connections or receive network datagrams. Note, that this method is called during server context tree initialization. Not all server contexts may be available at the time of its call. To access any server context during plugin startup, override globalStart() method.
        Throws:
        PluginException - If an error occurred during initialization

      • userInit

        void userInit(Context userContext)
       throws PluginException
        This method is called once for every system user upon its creation or server startup. Its implementation will in most cases call createUserConfigContext() to create plugin user-level configuration. This method won't be called if user-level configuration is disabled for the user.
        Throws:
        PluginException - If an error occurred during initialization

      • globalDeinit

        void globalDeinit(Context rootContext)
           throws PluginException
        This method is called once during server shutdown. It's usually used to terminate any threads created by the plugin and close all server sockets opened by it.
        Throws:
        PluginException - If an error occurred during de-initialization

      • userDeinit

        void userDeinit(Context userContext)
         throws PluginException
        This method is called once for every system user upon its deletion or server shutdown. The method will be called even if user-level configuration is disabled for the user.
        Throws:
        PluginException - If an error occurred during de-initialization

      • globalStart

        void globalStart()
          throws PluginException
        This method is called once for every plugin at the moment when server context tree is fully initialized and all contexts are available.
        Throws:
        PluginException - If an error occurred during plugin startup

      • globalStop

        void globalStop()
         throws PluginException
        This method is called once for every plugin upon server shutdown.
        Throws:
        PluginException - If an error occurred during plugin shutdown

      • createGlobalConfigContext

        Context createGlobalConfigContext(Context rootContext,
                                  boolean requestReboot,
                                  VariableDefinition... properties)
        This method creates and returns context containing plugin's global configuration. There is no need to keep reference to this context for future use as it may be accessed via getGlobalConfigContext() method.
        Parameters:
        rootContext - Server root context
        requestReboot - Prompt an operator to reboot server after a global plugin property change
        properties - List of global plugin properties
        Returns:
        Plugin global config context

      • createUserConfigContext

        Context createUserConfigContext(Context userContext,
                                boolean requestReboot,
                                VariableDefinition... properties)
        This method creates and returns context containing plugin's user-level configuration. There is no need to keep reference to this context for future use as it may be accessed via getUserConfigContext() method.
        Parameters:
        userContext - Context of user to associate the configuration with
        requestReboot - Prompt an operator to reboot server after a global plugin property change
        properties - List of user-level plugin properties
        Returns:
        Plugin user-level config context

      • getGlobalConfigContext

        Context getGlobalConfigContext()
        Returns plugin's global configuration context
        Returns:
        Global configuration context

      • getUserConfigContext

        Context getUserConfigContext(java.lang.String username)
        Returns plugin's user-level configuration context or NULL if user-level configuration is disabled for the user.
        Returns:
        User-level configuration context
